PASSWORD_INVALID: Password must have length between 6 to 20 characters
SAME_CURRENT_PASSWORD: Your password is the same as the old one
ERR_CREATE_USER_DOB: User is under 18. Please select a different date
ERR_CREATE_USER_JD_DOB: Joined date is not later than Date of Birth. Please select a different date
ERR_CREATE_USER_JD: Joined date is Saturday or Sunday. Please select a different date
ERR_USER_HAVE_VALID_ASSIGNMENT: There are valid assignments belonging to this user. Please close all assignments before disabling user.

ERR_CATEGORY_CODE_EXISTED: Prefix is already existed. Please enter a different prefix
